translations: adj.[会计]应计的；增值的；权责已发生的
v.积累（accrue 的过去分词）；形成

sentences.sentence: The firm had accrued debts of over $6m.
sentences.translation: 该公司已积欠了600多万元的债务。

sentences.sentence: I owed $5,000 – part of this was accrued interest.
sentences.translation: 我欠$5000–这其中的一部分是累积的利息。

sentences.sentence: They have the same accrued salary.
